metadata.synopsis: Gale is interested in items woven with especially powerful magic. In these lines, you see one such item. This one is an Amulet of Selune.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Seems like that Selûnite amulet might catch your eye, Gale.

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: Moonmaiden's magic. Both beautiful and powerful indeed.
